verses.text: Before \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* chief \w commander|strong="H8661"\w*, \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w Sargon|strong="H5623"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria, \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Ashdod \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w attacked|strong="H3898"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w* \w it|strong="H7971"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w already|strong="H1980"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amoz, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w remove|strong="H6605"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w waist|strong="H4975"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w walking|strong="H1980"\w* \w around|strong="H5921"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w barefoot|strong="H3182"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, “Just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Isaiah|strong="H3470"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w barefoot|strong="H3182"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* omen \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*,

\w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* \w away|strong="H5090"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3651"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1546"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w*, \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* alike, \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w barefoot|strong="H3182"\w*, \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w bared|strong="H2834"\w* \w buttocks|strong="H8357"\w*—\w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*’s \w shame|strong="H6172"\w*.

\w Those|strong="H4480"\w* who \w made|strong="H4714"\w* \w Cush|strong="H3568"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w hope|strong="H4007"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w boast|strong="H8597"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* ashamed.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dwellers \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* coastland \w will|strong="H4428"\w* say, ‘\w See|strong="H2009"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* happened \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H5337"\w* source \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w hope|strong="H4007"\w*, \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w help|strong="H5833"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H5337"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Assyria! \w How|strong="H2009"\w* \w then|strong="H2009"\w* can \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*?’”
